page.title: 02FARM IMPLEMENTS
page.content: My name is Jacqueline Hogg and I live in Walton.I do{NOT}live on a farm!.On farms in this area there are lots of implements.Some of the more common tractor names are:Case International, Massey Ferguson, Ford, Fiat, and John Deere.Tractors can pull such things as:ploughs-with 2,3,or 4 ploughshares- and a disc harrow for slicing the ploughed topsoil.The tractor can also pull a seed drill as well as a boom sprayer which kills weeds without damaging the crop.Also in use on farms are such things as swathe turners-for hay turning- and forage harvesters for taking grass directly from the fields into storage.Other tools are:the hay mowing machine,bale carrier,and manure spreader(for spreading liquid organic manure).My grandad has a farm a few miles away at Roadhead-sometimes I help him with the hay and lambing.
